results.title: The possibilities of using beta-blocker bisoprolol in patients with stable angina with concomitant bronchial asthma.
results.text_hl: Aim    To compare efficacy and safety of treatments with the @CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@calcium@@@ antagonist (CA) @CHEMICAL_Verapamil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014700 @@@verapamil@@@, the cardioselective beta-blocker (BB) @CHEMICAL_Bisoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017298 @@@bisoprolol@@@, and a combination therapy with @CHEMICAL_Bisoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017298 @@@bisoprolol@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Angina_Stable</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D060050 @@@stable angina@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Angina_Stable</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D060050 @@@SA@@@) with concurrent mild and moderate, persistent @DISEASE_Asthma @DISEASE_MESH:D001249 @@@bronchial asthma@@@ (@DISEASE_Asthma @DISEASE_MESH:D001249 @@@BA@@@).

citations.NLM: Grigorieva NY, Ilushina TP, Kolosova KS. The possibilities of using beta-blocker bisoprolol in patients with stable angina with concomitant bronchial asthma. Kardiologiia. 2022 Jan 31;62(1):32-39. PMID: 35168531
citations.BibTeX: @article{35168531, title={The possibilities of using beta-blocker bisoprolol in patients with stable angina with concomitant bronchial asthma.}, author={Grigorieva NY and Ilushina TP and Kolosova KS}, journal={Kardiologiia}, volume={62}, number={1}, pages={32-39}}

results.title: The pharmacokinetic profile of amlodipine.
results.text_hl: Comparison of the pharmacokinetics of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with chronic @<m>DISEASE_Angina_Stable</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D060050 @@@stable angina pectoris@@@ with the profile in healthy volunteers suggested that clearance is not altered in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with chronic @<m>DISEASE_Angina_Stable</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D060050 @@@stable angina@@@, steady state being reached 6 to 12 hours after administration of the drug.
